verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Jonathelemrechokim <S%H3128><s%>, Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H270><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him in Gat <S%H1661><s%>. Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: for man <S%H582><s%> would swallow me up <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; he fighting <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8802><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> oppresseht <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me.

Mine enemies <S%H8324><s%> <S%H8802><s%> would daily <S%H3117><s%> swallow <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me up: for they be many <S%H7227><s%> that fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against me, O thou most High <S%H4791><s%>.
What time <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thee.

In 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, in 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> I have put my trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; I will not fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what flesh <S%H1320><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me.
Havahry day <S%H3117><s%> they wrest <S%H6087><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>: all their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against me for evil <S%H7451><s%>.

They gather themselves together <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, they hide <S%H6845><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6845><s%> <S%H8686><s%> themselves, they mark <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my steps <S%H6119><s%>, when they wait <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Shall they escape <S%H6405><s%> by iniquity <S%H205><s%>? in thine anger <S%H639><s%> cast down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Thou tellest <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my wanderings <S%H5112><s%>: put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou my tears <S%H1832><s%> into thy bottle <S%H4997><s%>: are they not in thy book <S%H5612><s%> ?

When <S%H3117><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, then shall mine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> back <S%H268><s%>: this I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is for me.
In 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>: in the YY <S%H3068><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>.
In 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> have I put my trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what man <S%H120><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me.
Thy vows <S%H5088><s%> are upon me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: I will render <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> praises <S%H8426><s%> unto thee.

For thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>: wilt not thou deliver my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling <S%H1762><s%>, that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8692><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> ?
